attributes.action: University of Bristol must publish salaries of staff named on 2017 Annual Report
attributes.additional_details:
For income and expenditure figures and the names of the Executive Team at the University of Bristol see:      

http://www.bristol.ac.uk/media-library/sites/finance/documents/annual-report-financial-statements-2017.pdf
attributes.background: In response to the >700 lecturers striking over pension cuts and the 14 days of teaching students stand to miss, the University's Executive Team must answer why their £608 million 2017 income is insufficient to pay their teaching staff and secure the teaching hours for their paying students.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on the University of Bristol, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
